title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 317.19 - Jar closure requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 317.19 - Jar closure requirements

State Regulations

Agriculture and Markets Law, ยง 96-z-34

Vacuum packed containers sealed with a quick-twist, screw-on, or snap-on lids (or closures) shall not have an annular space between
the inner edge of the lid's rim (lip or skirt) and the container itself or
shall have such space sealed in a manner that will make it inaccessible to
filth and insects. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
317.19

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
